text: Gérard Worms (1 August 1936 – 31 August 2020) was a French banker and businessman. He was the Vice Chairman of Rothschild Europe and Senior Advisor of Rothschild & Cie Banque. He was born in Paris. He taught at the HEC Paris, the University of Paris and he was a alma mater, at the École Polytechnique. He was the Chairman of Rothschild & Cie Banque (Paris) from 1995 to 1999. He also was Chief Executive Officer of N M Rothschild & Sons. Worms died on 31 August 2020, aged 84.La mort de Gérard Worms, industriel et figure de la finance ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French bankers Category:Businesspeople from Paris
title: Gérard Worms
